holidays.title: Bell Bottoms Day
holidays.description: We’re celebrating one of the oldest fashion trends so make sure you wear your bell bottoms.

holidays.title: Cheng Ming Festival
holidays.description: Honor your ancestors’ lives by burning a candle and paying your respects to them.

holidays.title: National Baked Ham with Pineapple Day

holidays.title: National Nebraska Day

holidays.title: Qingming Festival
holidays.description: Qingming Festival is when people honor their ancestors through traditional food offerings and by sweeping tombs.

holidays.description: The amazing capacity of a paper road map allows you to explore any territories.
